title: Google assistant pops up, spotify turns on, video calls drop on WhatsApp in seconds.
content:
Google voice assistant keeps popping up, I've turned it off and still pops up.
Spotify starts playing by itself. 
My watsapp video calls keep dropping in secands. 
Might be headphones?
I've restarted my phone, checked my wifi. 
Been happening since android update. 
Not sur what to do
